titleStmt.title: Sinnes discovery by the emblem of a toad
titleStmt.author: P. F.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for John Overton, and are to be sold at his shop at the sign of the White-Horse without New-Gate,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Poor man, why, with disdain do'st look on me?".
Reproduction of the original at the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop at the sign of the White-Horse without New-Gate
